H0.text: What facial hair style was made famous by American Civil War general Ambrose Burnside. Burnside Beard

H1.text: What facial hair style was made famous by American Civil War general Ambrose Burnside. General's Goatee

H2.text: What facial hair style was made famous by American Civil War general Ambrose Burnside. Civil War Chin Strap

H3.text: What facial hair style was made famous by American Civil War general Ambrose Burnside. Sideburn

A4.text: His style of thick facial hair became known as 'sideburns', deriving from the two syllables of his surname.

A5.text: the word burnsides was coined to describe this style. The syllables were later reversed to give sideburns.
